features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file. This feature was mentioned in 23 Sendlane reviews.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 22 Sendlane reviews. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product. This feature was mentioned in 21 Sendlane reviews.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements 23 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action. This feature was mentioned in 22 Sendlane reviews.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 20 Sendlane reviews. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: As reported in 18 Sendlane reviews. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 23 Sendlane reviews. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application. 17 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 37 Sendlane reviews. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 36 Sendlane reviews. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: As reported in 37 Sendlane reviews. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores 25 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information. 25 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects. This feature was mentioned in 26 Sendlane reviews.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 30 Sendlane reviews. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. This feature was mentioned in 33 Sendlane reviews.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: As reported in 25 Sendlane reviews. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history. 31 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database. This feature was mentioned in 32 Sendlane reviews.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: As reported in 33 Sendlane reviews. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps. 31 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 32 Sendlane reviews. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device. 26 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system. This feature was mentioned in 25 Sendlane reviews.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI. This feature was mentioned in 27 Sendlane reviews.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar. 22 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: As reported in 22 Sendlane reviews. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices. 22 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time 21 reviewers of Sendlane have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 32 Sendlane reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity. This feature was mentioned in 28 Sendlane reviews.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: As reported in 25 Sendlane reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: As reported in 23 Sendlane reviews. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent communications tool for businesses that want to scale
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
I switched to Sendlane 6 months ago from a competing product. What drew me to Sendlane was the straightforward approach to email communication. They had all the features I wanted and it was easy to get started.

The customer service is also top notch. They helped me warm up my list and get my automations set up.

I like that I can create automations based on e-commerce activity or any other behavior on my website (such as known subscribers visiting a particular page on my site).

The education they provide on how to build better email communication content is fantastic too.

I use their API extensively and like that I can code my own custom workflows from my custom application.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
They used to have a dedicated account representative for their entrprise customers (I'm on an enterprise plan), offering monthly 1:1 calls to review your account and deliverability. They took away that service shortly after I signed up.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sendlane helps get my message in the inbox of my audience.

initial_reviews.review_title: Simple, comprehensive, easy-on-the-eye user interface! Excellent for beginners
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
What I love the best about Sendlane is the UI (User Interface)... it is the first thing you see when opening the app and is very non-intimidating, which can be a turn-off when you are new to autoresponders and new to any particular platform. Words are large, navigation is easy, colors are lovely and unique. The helpdesk is very responsive and oh so patient for those of us who are still learning the system. While I am fairly NEW to autoresponders, this is NOT my first one but this is the one that I like best. It is simple, yet gives you many options for specificity if needed.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
Um... the only thing I dislike is that I am unable to change the email address that I originally signed up with due to several factors. It doesn't REALLY matter much however I am unable to access that email address... (it is linked to a domain I own ) so I cannot see if people try to reply. I remedy this by putting a different email address in my signature. It's really a personal problem, not necessarily a problem with the app.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
The two biggest problems I have been able to solve with Sendlane is with easily scheduling future emails (and specifying groups &/or sub-groups/segments that receive it) and scheduling the contact clean-up that happens on a regular basis so that non-responsible members are automatically removed after a certain period of time. This way my list is always fresh. Another benefit (which I don't use but I think is excellent) is there is the option of using ready-made template designs with images for a more catchy email. I don't use it only because I use text-only emails with the specific purposes of my autoresponder needs. However, it was great when I had to send out invitations for my grandmother's funeral as people could just sign up for the list and I was able to send out nicely designed emails with images.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Sendlane?
review_question_answers.answer: What I love the best about Sendlane is the UI (User Interface)... it is the first thing you see when opening the app and is very non-intimidating, which can be a turn-off when you are new to autoresponders and new to any particular platform. Words are large, navigation is easy, colors are lovely and unique. The helpdesk is very responsive and oh so patient for those of us who are still learning the system. While I am fairly NEW to autoresponders, this is NOT my first one but this is the one that I like best. It is simple, yet gives you many options for specificity if needed.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Sendlane?
review_question_answers.answer: Um... the only thing I dislike is that I am unable to change the email address that I originally signed up with due to several factors. It doesn't REALLY matter much however I am unable to access that email address... (it is linked to a domain I own ) so I cannot see if people try to reply. I remedy this by putting a different email address in my signature. It's really a personal problem, not necessarily a problem with the app.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The two biggest problems I have been able to solve with Sendlane is with easily scheduling future emails (and specifying groups &/or sub-groups/segments that receive it) and scheduling the contact clean-up that happens on a regular basis so that non-responsible members are automatically removed after a certain period of time. This way my list is always fresh. Another benefit (which I don't use but I think is excellent) is there is the option of using ready-made template designs with images for a more catchy email. I don't use it only because I use text-only emails with the specific purposes of my autoresponder needs. However, it was great when I had to send out invitations for my grandmother's funeral as people could just sign up for the list and I was able to send out nicely designed emails with images.

initial_reviews.review_title: A lot of room for improvement
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
Sendlane offers above-average deliverability, as well as custom event triggers that are remarkably easy to set up. Their predictive sending times of campaigns improves campaign performance a bit compared to the competition. Also, their support guides are incredibly well-written and contain substantial amounts of information.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
Support for major e-commerce platforms not named Shopify, like BigCommerce, is dilapidated to the point that you cannot trust the accuracy of essential KPIs like attributable revenue. Additionally, contact imports are subject to human review-which itself is not an issue, but you may find yourself suddenly and inexplicably subject to being unable to continue manual imports even if your spam and unsubscribe rates are low. After switching email service providers to one of their competitors-who has no issue with manual contact imports-we experienced a noticeable improvement to deliverability.

Recommendations to others considering Sendlane:
If you are a Shopify user and bring your contacts in solely through that CRM, Sendlane might be a perfect solution. Outside of that, look elsewhere.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sendlane showed us what features we needed to have when switching to our next solution.

initial_reviews.review_title: The support is top notch.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
The support was a pleasant surprise. So many products out there look great, but offer little-to-no support, beyond a slow responding help desk. Not the case with Sendlane. From the beginning we were assigned a Sendlane rep and I was pleasantly surprised at the level of help she provided in getting us setup. What a relief to have someone from Sendlane take the time to really look into how we were setup in our CRM and help us import data into our Sendlane account.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
Nothing really so far. All of our contact with Sendlane has been nothing but positive thus far.

Note: I am new to the Internet Marketing space, so it would be good for Sendlane to have Sendlane have more information on their home pages that explains to someone with my profile (an IM newbie) why their service is good and why it's important to have in place, beyond the services that are already available to me through my current CRM.  Maybe a section on their site that really spells out, in layman's terms, why the Sendlane service is important.  My biggest question mark is how will Sendlane ultimately improve our bottom line, compared to marketing through our CRM.

I have yet to dive deep into the offerings of Sendlane, so there may be some things that come up later down the line. But for now, it's all systems go. The dashboard seems intuitive and complete.

Recommendations to others considering Sendlane:
I would recommend Sendlane. Especially for someone who may not be tech-savvy. The support we received from our rep has been much appreciated.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
Nothing too ground breaking to note here. We needed help with our email marketing and Sendlane delivered. I believe Sendlane will also offer us certain benefits in terms of reputation and deliverability.

initial_reviews.review_title: The best Auto Responder I have come across
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
After trying many many autoresponders on the market I finally found Sendlane. Their platform is intuitive and constantly evolving and their support is 2nd to none, super friendly and always there to help with anything you might need from setting something up to looking at stats and helping explain them. Deliverability is excellent.  I also find the automations an excellent feature especially the ability to split the audience based on their responses, really neat.  I did have a challenge integrating with ThriveCart not a few months back and Sendlane were happy to get their development team talking with ThriveCart's team to find a resolution, a level of service I haven't come across.  I am also impressed with the innovation and evolution of the platform which has seen several feature updates and releases since I have been using it. As I say I have tried many of the mainstream autoresponders and and Sendlane is the best I have used.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
I haven't come across anything I dislike about the the Sendlane platform, as I say it is a very well thought out environment which is intuitive to use and has top notch support if you ever get stuck.

Recommendations to others considering Sendlane:
Try it out, I am almost certainly you'll love the experience, features and support.

My deliverability went up as soon as I started using Sendlane which ultimately converted into improved audience engagement and sales.

initial_reviews.review_title: Extremely easy to use + Great Support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
Ease of use, quick and easy process to create new campaigns, send to mailing lists, import of contacts, great integration options to various third parties like clickbank to grab your new customers from.

Powerful automation features with and/or/if statements to then send those contacts email blasts and track conversions from within.  Able to resend emails to people who missed your first emails, to segment by email, name, location, other variables, etc.

They also allow marketing emails while many other email platforms do not. This is a very major selling point and makes it stand out from the rest.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
if there was an easier "one click" type of way to cleanup bounced/unsubbed/inactive emails so they don't clog up the account.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
Best part is the set it and forget it nature. Create a massive automation once, then have it sent to all your new customers without having to do anything else.

initial_reviews.review_title: You don't know what your email marketing is missing until you see all that Sendlance has to offer!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
The automations that you can easily custom build to help manage your lists. List hygiene is important, and Sendlane helped us setup automatic emails to retarget unengaged contacts and filter out the uninterested ones. The Sendlane staff has been super helpful in educating us on better practices and helping us improve our capabilities. Our engagement rates have skyrocketed since using Sendlane!

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
There's not much we dislike. We have two brands on one account that we switch back and forth between, but revenue and metrics/data collection can only be integrated to one store at a time. It would be nice to connect to both storefronts this way. I wish there was a mobile app with some campaign building capabilities for managing our email marketing when on the road, but I'm told their dev team has been looking at it. More tutorials on specific automations would be helpful so I don't have to bug my Sendlane rep too often, but they are always willing to help anyway they can.

Recommendations to others considering Sendlane:
I would heavily recommend Sendlane to any mid to large size business that needs powerful email marketing tools without the hassles from other email platform providers.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have two brands that share some contact lists, but also have specific dedicated lists that don't cross over. Sendlane allows us to easily send from each brand and select the appropriate lists and segments for the message. We have seen a consistently higher engagement with both brands since switching to Sendlane.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent communications tool for businesses that want to scale
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
I switched to Sendlane 6 months ago from a competing product. What drew me to Sendlane was the straightforward approach to email communication. They had all the features I wanted and it was easy to get started.

The customer service is also top notch. They helped me warm up my list and get my automations set up.

I like that I can create automations based on e-commerce activity or any other behavior on my website (such as known subscribers visiting a particular page on my site).

The education they provide on how to build better email communication content is fantastic too.

I use their API extensively and like that I can code my own custom workflows from my custom application.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
They used to have a dedicated account representative for their entrprise customers (I'm on an enterprise plan), offering monthly 1:1 calls to review your account and deliverability. They took away that service shortly after I signed up.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sendlane helps get my message in the inbox of my audience.

all_reviews.review_title: Simple, comprehensive, easy-on-the-eye user interface! Excellent for beginners
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
What I love the best about Sendlane is the UI (User Interface)... it is the first thing you see when opening the app and is very non-intimidating, which can be a turn-off when you are new to autoresponders and new to any particular platform. Words are large, navigation is easy, colors are lovely and unique. The helpdesk is very responsive and oh so patient for those of us who are still learning the system. While I am fairly NEW to autoresponders, this is NOT my first one but this is the one that I like best. It is simple, yet gives you many options for specificity if needed.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
Um... the only thing I dislike is that I am unable to change the email address that I originally signed up with due to several factors. It doesn't REALLY matter much however I am unable to access that email address... (it is linked to a domain I own ) so I cannot see if people try to reply. I remedy this by putting a different email address in my signature. It's really a personal problem, not necessarily a problem with the app.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
The two biggest problems I have been able to solve with Sendlane is with easily scheduling future emails (and specifying groups &/or sub-groups/segments that receive it) and scheduling the contact clean-up that happens on a regular basis so that non-responsible members are automatically removed after a certain period of time. This way my list is always fresh. Another benefit (which I don't use but I think is excellent) is there is the option of using ready-made template designs with images for a more catchy email. I don't use it only because I use text-only emails with the specific purposes of my autoresponder needs. However, it was great when I had to send out invitations for my grandmother's funeral as people could just sign up for the list and I was able to send out nicely designed emails with images.

all_reviews.review_title: A lot of room for improvement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
Sendlane offers above-average deliverability, as well as custom event triggers that are remarkably easy to set up. Their predictive sending times of campaigns improves campaign performance a bit compared to the competition. Also, their support guides are incredibly well-written and contain substantial amounts of information.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
Support for major e-commerce platforms not named Shopify, like BigCommerce, is dilapidated to the point that you cannot trust the accuracy of essential KPIs like attributable revenue. Additionally, contact imports are subject to human review-which itself is not an issue, but you may find yourself suddenly and inexplicably subject to being unable to continue manual imports even if your spam and unsubscribe rates are low. After switching email service providers to one of their competitors-who has no issue with manual contact imports-we experienced a noticeable improvement to deliverability.

Recommendations to others considering Sendlane:
If you are a Shopify user and bring your contacts in solely through that CRM, Sendlane might be a perfect solution. Outside of that, look elsewhere.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sendlane showed us what features we needed to have when switching to our next solution.

all_reviews.review_title: Extremely easy to use + Great Support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
Ease of use, quick and easy process to create new campaigns, send to mailing lists, import of contacts, great integration options to various third parties like clickbank to grab your new customers from.

Powerful automation features with and/or/if statements to then send those contacts email blasts and track conversions from within.  Able to resend emails to people who missed your first emails, to segment by email, name, location, other variables, etc.

They also allow marketing emails while many other email platforms do not. This is a very major selling point and makes it stand out from the rest.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
if there was an easier "one click" type of way to cleanup bounced/unsubbed/inactive emails so they don't clog up the account.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
Best part is the set it and forget it nature. Create a massive automation once, then have it sent to all your new customers without having to do anything else.

all_reviews.review_title: You don't know what your email marketing is missing until you see all that Sendlance has to offer!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
The automations that you can easily custom build to help manage your lists. List hygiene is important, and Sendlane helped us setup automatic emails to retarget unengaged contacts and filter out the uninterested ones. The Sendlane staff has been super helpful in educating us on better practices and helping us improve our capabilities. Our engagement rates have skyrocketed since using Sendlane!

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
There's not much we dislike. We have two brands on one account that we switch back and forth between, but revenue and metrics/data collection can only be integrated to one store at a time. It would be nice to connect to both storefronts this way. I wish there was a mobile app with some campaign building capabilities for managing our email marketing when on the road, but I'm told their dev team has been looking at it. More tutorials on specific automations would be helpful so I don't have to bug my Sendlane rep too often, but they are always willing to help anyway they can.

Recommendations to others considering Sendlane:
I would heavily recommend Sendlane to any mid to large size business that needs powerful email marketing tools without the hassles from other email platform providers.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have two brands that share some contact lists, but also have specific dedicated lists that don't cross over. Sendlane allows us to easily send from each brand and select the appropriate lists and segments for the message. We have seen a consistently higher engagement with both brands since switching to Sendlane.

all_reviews.review_title: Exactly what I was looking for
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
The interface is incredibly intuitive.  Email service providers can be quite complex, but with SendLane, I was able to figure out how things worked almost immediately.  It's very easy to get started, if you're new to email service providers, or moving over from another one, you'll definitely be pleased with how easy it is to get started.  The customer support is the best I've ever seen on any email platform, and believe me, I've used a lot of them.

Another feature I really like, is how it will give you the ability to do automatic list hygiene. This was incredibly tedious to deal with on other platforms.  Now, I can automatically segment out my inactive subscribers on my list.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
So far I have not encountered anything I particularly dislike.

Recommendations to others considering Sendlane:
I'd recommend them... good deliverability, very easy to get started, good customer support.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
Deliverability.  With SendLane, I'm getting open rates that are much higher than I was getting with other platforms.

all_reviews.review_title: Sendlane is a beast for email delivery and automation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
I love Sendlane! Been a client for over a year now and there's nothing short of what this platform can do. It's ultra robust and give me the power I need for my business and getting more data. The automation is easy to build, the segmentation is deep and the email builder is easy for non-technical folks like me. They gave me the power that usually requires an expensive $100k+ a year tool like Salesforce or Bronto.

The email delivery is amazing and so is the support. We were able to increase our email open rates by over 25% - this is due to following the direction of the support team as we took on their recommendations.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
I can't really say anything at the moment. Their support has been A+ and their platform features and functionalities are incredible especially at the price point in comparison to their competition.

Recommendations to others considering Sendlane:
I highly recommend you use it. One thing that was important for us was support. The support with SendLane has been the best we've deal with so it has removed a lot of headaches we've I highly recommend you use it.

One major challenge in the past is moving an email list to another providor has been challenging. With Sendlane the team helped us and I cannot think of how they could have made it easier. They were there to help us every step of the way and even recommended ways for us to optimize our email delivery, so we had an increase in our open rates by over 25% when we moved our list to their platform.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation and deep segmentation to build out audiences as it's important for our message to be crystal clear to our customers as we have them across a multitude of different audiences and verticals.

When we first moved over we were able to increase our email open rates by 25% - so this was hugely beneficial for us. The Sendlane support team and their attention to detail really stood out to us as we've tried a number of different platforms to help us with our email delivery and so far our experience with Sendlane has been remarkable.

all_reviews.review_title: The best e-mail autoresponder service out there.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sendlane?
The combination of the simple to use interface and "commonsenseness" of the software, combined with it's advanced and powerful features makes it a complete home run.

The automations that it comes with are as good as many advanced CRMS, but you can get it at half the cost, and you get all of the power of the best e-mail provider around.

What do you dislike about Sendlane?
That I don't think it would be possible to compete with them even if I wanted to. :)

Recommendations to others considering Sendlane:
Buy it, don't think twice, and use all of the features.

What problems is Sendlane solving and how is that benefiting you?
E-mail marketing
